BriefIntro.begin: 买说卖是一个另类社交平台。在这里你可以：
BriefIntro.buyLong: 每个故事都有一个主人，买下即拥有。你也可以创建新故事。
BriefIntro.sayLong: 作为故事的主人，你是唯一可以回复的人。说点什么吧。
BriefIntro.sellLong: 把你的故事上架到市场。你的言论为故事赋予价值。

what.title: 什么鬼
what.p1: 买说卖是一个另类社交平台。在这里，故事可以买卖，同时只有故事的主人能为故事添加内容。

motivation.title: 动机
motivation.p1: People bla bla bla too much on Internet. Their words are trash. So build a place where people always say something interesting. By interesting we mean words that ignite people to comments to it, and those comments contribute more value to the story. People really want to express their idea even it requires money.

pricing.title: 定价
pricing.p2: This application is developed mostly for experimental purpose.

contract.title: 合约与源码
contract.sourceText: 买说卖由两部分组成：合约和网页。其源码可在这里查看：
